Code: EXEC SQL SELECT t2.FONTE, t2.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO, t2.NRENDOS, t2.DATORR, t2.CODCAU, t2.CODSUBES, t2.NUM_APOLICE FROM SEGUROS.VG_DPS_PROPOSTA_HIST-MEST-BILHETE t1, SEGUROS.VG_DPS_PROPOSTA_HIST-MEST-BILHETE t2 WHERE t1.NUMbil = :NUMBIL AND t2.num_apolice = t1.num_apolice ORDER BY t2.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO END SQL
